#summary Overview of installation

= Introduction =

The !BigBlueButton 0.81 server runs under Ubuntu 10.04 64-bit.  To setup your own !BigBlueButton server:

    * [InstallationUbuntu Install from packages] (Ubuntu 10.04 64-bit)
    * [BigBlueButtonVM Download BigBlueButton Virtual Machine] (OS X and Windows)

After you've setup a !BigBlueButton server, you can configure it using the `bbb-conf` tool, see

    * [BBBConf BigBlueButton configuration tool]

If you are new to !BigBlueButton, please read through the [TechnicalOverview overview] pages to learn more about !BigBlueButton's architecture and configuration.
